Description: On US-58 in the City of Chesapeake, in the vicinity of the ramp to I-664, near 664 Interchange, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east exit ramp narrows.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 93.3 in the County of Hanover, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On US-17 in the County of Essex, in the vicinity of Maryfield Rd; Turnout; Rt. 1215N/S (Essex County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 122.8 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-77 at mile marker 2.9 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left shoulder, left lane, and center lane are closed.

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 72.3 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right lane and right shoulder are closed.
